data.title: Rodney "Ron" Daniel Brant Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: Rodney "Ron" Daniel Brant, of Ray City, passed away on Wednesday, March 17, 2021. Ron was born on February 17, 1944 in Benton Township, Michigan to the late Russell Jaleb Brant...
data.text:
Rodney “Ron” Daniel Brant, of Ray City, passed away on Wednesday, March 17, 2021. Ron was born on February 17, 1944 in Benton Township, Michigan to the late Russell Jaleb Brant and Mildred Blair Brant. He was a long-haul truck driver and also did small engine repair. He was a stubborn hard-working man, who liked to stay busy and tinker with things. Ron liked to line dance to country music and tell dad jokes. He was a very generous guy who was always willing to help. Ron deeply loved his Lord and Saviour.

Ron is survived by his wife Debra Brant of Ray City; his daughters, Dena Brant, Kristie Brant, Lindsay Brant, Sara Kilburn, Christina Mortimore, Cora-Jean Brant, Jacquelyn Brant, and Megan Stone; his son, Christopher (CJ) Brant; a cousin Jeanette Dahl; a brother, Wilson Brant; thirteen grandchildren and two great grandchildren.

Ron will be cremated and no services will be held at this time. Condolences to the family may be conveyed online at www.mclanecares.com. Carson McLane Funeral Home

To order memorial trees or send flowers to the family in memory of Rodney "Ron" Daniel Brant, please visit our flower store.
